ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Burynai Bundt Cake Quest
ygData.msgSnippet: Well it s entirely possible that it s not foraged at all.  The guild could have given me some misinformation somehow.  After all there *is* an oven way in the
ygData.messageBody:
Well it's entirely possible that it's not foraged at all. The guild could
have given me some misinformation somehow. After all there *is* an oven way
in the back of the Temple of Droga that has *no reason* to be back there
except for quests. It's not like I'm going to travel all the way there just
to hang out back around a bunch of scowling level 33-36 mobs making myself
some pies. :-)

[51 Minstrel] Crier (Half Elf) <Seekers of Norrath> ZONE: work


> Below is a link to foraged items in kunark. No bundt
> cake listed. Maybe we are looking in the wrong place?
>
> http://www.eqdruids.com/foraging.htm
>
